meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or resembling canker sores.
meanings.sent1: Her aphthous mouth sores made it painful to eat.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with an aphthous ulcer on her lip.
meanings.sent3: Despite her aphthous sores, she tried to smile through the pain.
meanings.sent4: The aphthous lesions on his tongue felt like tiny volcanoes erupting.
meanings.sent5: The aphthous blisters on her gums were a constant source of discomfort.

meanings.definition: Characterized by the presence of canker sores.
meanings.sent1: His aphthous condition caused frequent outbreaks of mouth ulcers.
meanings.sent2: She avoided acidic foods to prevent aphthous lesions from forming.
meanings.sent3: The aphthous nature of his condition made him the butt of many jokes.
meanings.sent4: The aphthous patches in her mouth felt like tiny daggers with every bite.
meanings.sent5: The aphthous spots on his lips were a visible sign of his health struggles.
